channel.title: Bigger Screen
channel.description:
Hey, I saw a large client on empscape.... I have onley a small client so i thougt i gone make my client biggger....
I changed this in gui.java gamePanel.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(765, 503));
and change the dimension.... The client start up bigger... but on the bottom and right side of my client i see only whit sreen... and my play window is still in the left conor in the top...
How to chang my window to right conor in the bottom??

item.title: Bigger Screen
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

SWAT made a 317 fullscreen deob. Try extracting the necessary methods from that.

Read full topic

item.title: Bigger Screen
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

You have to edit other parts of the client to make them fit in the bigger windows, if you search in the download section their are a few full screen clients.

Read full topic

item.title: Bigger Screen

item.description:
@rraayy wrote:

frostscapeserver:

You can’t…It’s your computer. You need a bigger screen is all. >_>

I have a big screen 1680 x 1050 so what’s the problem?

item.title: Bigger Screen
item.dc:creator: @rraayy rraayy
item.description:
@rraayy wrote:

Hey,
I saw a large client on empscape…
I have onley a small client so i thougt i gone make my client biggger…

I changed this in gui.java
gamePanel.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(765, 503));

and change the dimension…
The client start up bigger…
but on the bottom and right side of my client i see only whit sreen… and my play window is still in the left conor in the top…

How to chang my window to right conor in the bottom??

Read full topic
